oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Sharḥ Bukhārī min taṣānīf Mawlānā Luṭfī : manuscript, 1586
Fuṣūl Luṭfī
Sharḥ Ṣaḥīḥ al-Bukhārī
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Molla Lûtfi , -1494
oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: Ibn ʻAbd al-Qādir, Abū Bakr ibn ʻĪsá (scribe.)
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Beginning of a commentary on Bukhārī's al-Jāmiʻ al-Ṣaḥīḥ. It seems that the author never completed his work.
According to the colophon (f. 35v), copy completed in early Shawwāl 994 AH [September 1586 AD] in Istanbul in the hand of Abū Bakr ibn ʻĪsá ibn ʻAbd al-Qādir.
Written in one column, 25 lines per page, in black.
Cream laid paper with watermarks. 21.2 x 14 cm. (16 x 8 cm.).
Missing one leaf between ff. 30 and 31.
MS Arab 280. Houghton Library, Harvard University.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Bukhārī, Muḥammad ibn Ismāʻīl--810-870
Hadith
